title: HTTP & HTTPS
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
**HTTP**: HyperText Transfer Protocol. Text based. Stateless. Port 80.
**HTTPS**: HTTP + SSL/TLS Encryption. Secure. Port 443. 
Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE.

interview_questions.question: Difference between GET and POST?
interview_questions.answer: GET sends data in URL (visible, limited). POST sends in Body (hidden, large).

real_world_use_cases.description: Must use HTTPS for credit cards.
